text:
Hello
please let me know where do i get these 4 functions in HubSpot? and can we perform these function through external extension?
• Screen pop
• click to dial
• no match, multimatch and single match
• activity creation

Is anyone having issues in HS today relating to quotes? I have a deal that when I create a new quote it is not starting at the step where you select a template. Instead it is automatically picking up the name of an existing quote and using that template and showing the Buyer step. This is not happening on all deals, only one in particular. Any ideas?? (edited)
I figured it out - looks like HS has moved the first step (Details) to later in the process (a new step called Template & Details which is after the Signature step)

:orange_heart:*Please take a moment to review our Code of Conduct*:orange_heart:

We want the HubSpot Developer community to be inclusive and welcoming. By following our Code of Conduct, you can help ensure that's the case.

TL;DR:
• Be respectful
• Be inclusive (try not to say, "Hey guys, hey boys, hey [any specific group]")
• No self promotion, except for <#C0121KGC6RM|showcase> and <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> 
• No unsolicited DMs
Read the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct|whole thing here> - and thanks for being a part of the HubSpot Developer Community!

Want to report a violation? DM <@UQNEXHW14> or fill out the <https://form.asana.com/?k=p7aM0fpd3G4JGETDL_nYXg&d=8587152060687|anonymous form here>.

Hello Everyone,
I need your assistance with an issue. I'm using a child theme and adding a custom font through the theme editor, which works fine within the editor. However, when I transfer the theme settings to the `field.json` file, an error occurs related to the 'fontid'. Without the 'fontid', the custom font doesn't function properly. Any help would be appreciated!
